name: Argentum Age
description:
Argentum Age is a digital collectible card game with tactical elements and a focus on skill and positioning. Choose where to summon your creatures onto the board, but then watch as they have a mind of their own once summoned. You can still influence them with spells but you can't control them directly. Influencing them into defeating your opponent is all part of the skill and strategy of the game.
We aim to be a community-driven game that is developed by and for its players. The game is Open Source and is designed to be moddable. We are also committed to Argentum Age avoiding any “pay to win” elements that some games feature.
Argentum Age is currently in beta, and we welcome any feedback we can get. Please download it, try it out, and let us know what you think. Our Discord Server is the best place to meet us, provide feedback, and get involved with development.
